net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components

Class MenuBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.Component
      • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.Panel
        • net.foxycorndog.jfoxylib.components.MenuBar

  • public class MenuBar
extends Panel
    Class used to create an organized bar used as a menu for any specific purpose or another.
    Since:
    Jun 30, 2013 at 10:33:27 PM, v0.2
    Version:
    Jun 30, 2013 at 10:33:27 PM, v0.2
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MenuBar(Panel parent)
      Create a MenuBar inside of the specified parent Panel.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMenuItem(MenuItem item)
      Add the MenuItem to the end of the MenuBar and then update the MenuBar.
      void addMenuItem(MenuItem item, int index)
      Add the MenuItem to the specified index of the MenuBar and then update the MenuBar.
      boolean doesAutoResize()
      Get whether or not the MenuBar will dynamically change the size whenever MenuItems are added or removed from the bar.
      void render()
      Render the MenuBar at its current location.
      void setAutoResize(boolean autoResize)
      Set whether to auto-resize the MenuBar according to when MenuItems are added, removed, or changed.
      void update()
      Update the MenuBar to the current MenuItems.
